title: Not receiving mastery tokens
body: Multiple times now I have played normal summoners rift and gotten an s rank or better on a champion I am mastery 6 on and have not received my mastery 7 token. I already have 2 tokens and should have received my third by now.

replies.body: It was Fiora and my loot only shows 2tokens and I'm not able to craft the mastery 7 thing
It was Fiora and in my loot it is only showing up as 2
What champion were you referring to so I can check to see if anything is going wrong? It looks like you have 3 tokens for your Mastery 6 Fiora if that's who you were talking about.
